definition: variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念念有詞|念念有词[nian4 nian4 you3 ci2]
variant of 念念有詞|念念有词[nian4 nian4 you3 ci2]

sentences.english: When all men think alike, no man thinks very much.
sentences.chinese: 除夜家皆一樣唸的時間便出有人多唸了。

sentences.english: But Ms. Ma's quick action also has had an additional impact on 48-year-old Qiu Yan.
sentences.chinese: 不過馬曉唸的迅速行動給48歲的邱燕帶來了影響。

sentences.english: No matter what you're studying, you're studying stones.
sentences.chinese: 不管你在唸什麼，你念的都是石頭。

sentences.english: Shu Nian's leaving is an everlasting pain in Xie Yan, a wound that does not heal .
sentences.chinese: 舒唸的離去是謝炎永遠的痛，一個無法癒合的傷口。

sentences.english: So names that are difficult to pronounce seem to have negative connotations?
sentences.chinese: 由上所述，發音難唸的名字難道就有不祥的涵義嗎？

sentences.english: The teachings of Arminius got their start in the Holland because of the double election controversy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲雙重揀選的論戰，阿民唸的教導在荷蘭開始。

sentences.english: It is always not until before bed that I realize homework is not finished.
sentences.chinese: 總是要等到考試以後才知道該唸的書還沒有念。

sentences.english: The poem is read, but with a hint of sadness and regret.
sentences.chinese: 此詩雖唸的好，但是卻帶有一絲絲的悲傷與遺憾。

sentences.english: I started feeling anxious but stayed on, thinking the Friendship Hotel would appear soon.
sentences.chinese: 人開始急了，但仍是等，口唸朋誼賓館不久就到了。

sentences.english: My kids are in primary school.
As the Chinese proverb says, "everyone has the cupboard."
sentences.chinese: 正如中國的俗語所言，“人人有本難唸的經。”

sentences.english: Love is a particular automotiveefully designed lie.
sentences.chinese: 愛情是一個細巧設唸的大話。

sentences.english: Prayers were said for souls in Purgatory.
sentences.chinese: 禱告詞是爲煉獄中的靈魂唸的。

sentences.english: We could write just a few lines for him to read.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以寫幾行字讓他來唸。

sentences.english: Every family has a family skeleton.

definition: to recite or chant Buddhist scripture
Healing sutra/Bhaisajyaguru sutra
to read out/to recite/to remember sb (while talking about sth else)
to chant the sutras
Sanskrit (language)
Amitabha, the Buddha of the Western Paradise/abbr. for 阿彌陀佛|阿弥陀佛/Mituo or Mito township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Min dialects, spoken in Fujian Province, Taiwan etc
feel remorse/regret/repent
old variant of 冤[yuan1]
holy/sacred/saint/sage
Guangdong pidgin (a mix of Standard Mandarin and Cantonese)
chanting of prayers (Buddhism)
Buddhist monk (Sanskrit: jala)
(slang) swearword/four-letter word
Three Character Classic, 13th century reading primer consisting of Confucian tenets in lines of 3 characters
to teach/to train/to admonish/instruction (from superiors)/teachings/rule
one who surmounts all obstacles (Buddhism)
